alert.note: Alert for Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 7:56PM CST until February 21 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR WISE COUNTY... At 755 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cottondale, or 7 miles south of Bridgeport, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Bridgeport, Briar, Pecan Acres, New Fairview, Aurora, Boyd, Paradise, Cottondale, Boonsville, Rhome, Runaway Bay, Newark and Lake Bridgeport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
